name: Rookie Rider
description: Complete your first ride with us.

name: Eco Explorer
description: Complete 10 rides using eco-friendly vehicles.

name: Kilometer Conqueror
description: Reach a total of 100 kilometers ridden.

name: Green Initiator
description: Achieve the rank of Eco Pioneer.

name: Giver of Good
description: Complete 5 rides and make a charitable donation.

name: Carbon Crusher
description: Complete 100 eco-friendly rides.

name: Eco Avenger
description: Ride 200 kilometers on eco-friendly vehicles.

name: Green Commute Hero
description: Complete 50 eco-friendly rides.

name: Speed Demon
description: Complete 10 rides in under 30 minutes each.

name: Charitable Champion
description: Donate to charity 10 times.

name: Sustainability Advocate
description: Complete 500 kilometers using eco-friendly rides.

name: World Traveler
description: Complete a total of 1000 kilometers.

name: Weekend Warrior
description: Complete 20 rides during weekends.

name: Ride Royalty
description: Complete 50 rides with at least 80% satisfaction rating.

name: Green Ambassador
description: Share your sustainable journey on social media.

name: Sustainable Explorer
description: Explore 5 new eco-friendly routes.

name: Rider of the Month
description: Be awarded Rider of the Month for top rides.

name: Green Route Master
description: Complete 100 rides on designated eco-friendly routes.

name: Ultimate Eco Rider
description: Complete 1000 eco-friendly rides.

name: Zero Emissions Achiever
description: Achieve zero emissions on all your rides for 1 month.

name: Nature’s Ally
description: Complete 50 rides through natural reserves or green spaces.

name: Health Enthusiast
description: Complete 100 rides and achieve a fitness goal.

name: Sustainability Leader
description: Be a leader in sustainable mobility within the community.

name: Electric Hero
description: Complete 50 rides using electric vehicles.

name: Climate Champion
description: Reduce your carbon footprint by 100% over time.
